name: Amiel Malay
text: I think any answer here will tend to be subjective, as anything "best ever" will be choices by likely fans. Anyway, my preference tend towards Mission: Impossible (both shows), Jeopardy, and yes, the original MacGyver.   Local shows... how about "Ober da Bakod"?  :D

source_obj.text: I think any answer here will tend to be subjective, as anything "best ever" will be choices by likely fans. Anyway, my preference tend towards Mission: Impossible (both shows), Jeopardy, and yes, the original MacGyver.   Local shows... how about "Ober da Bakod"?  :D
